project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Second Banco de Fomento Nacional Project are: (i) to support the development of medium-sized economically viable industrial projects in the private and mixed sector enterprises with special emphasis on encouraging industries with export potential; (ii) to assist BFN in strengthening its export investment promotion and service capabilities; (iii) to contribute to Portugal's industrial restructuring in preparation for entry into the European Economic Community (EEC); and (iv) to improve BFN's arrears position.
